original_text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law: and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law;
korean_text: 무릇 율법 없이 범죄한 자는 또한 율법 없이 망하고 무릇 율법이 있고 범죄한 자는 율법으로 말미암아 심판을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: For as many as have sinned without law
and as many as have sinned in the law
shall be judged by the law
